text: @narendramodi Modiji! Happiii Morning on Janata Curfew day the Sunday 22nd March 2020. Ur very purpose is 2 fight COvID-19 is Laudable. Apart, I appreciate ur visdom 2 make the people UNITED. This'll help u 2 raise our Nation high. Lead the people/ the Nation. Alagappan Kochi Camp 22-03-2020
